bibl.title: Digital Restoration of Ancient Papyri. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Introduction. - The papyrus substrate. - Enhancing the letters [uses P. Schøyen I, 7 (= M.-P.3 490.11; LDAB 10024) and Inv. MS 2634/3 (= M.-P.3 537.1; LDAB 1311; Marganne 81)]. - The 7Q5 fragment (= van Haelst 1094; LDAB 6820). - The quality of the substrate. - Conclusions.
bibl.seg: SPARAVIGNA A., Digital Restoration of Ancient Papyri. Avec résumé en anglais.
arXiv.org (Cornell University Library) [2009] 6 pp., 7 figg. [Uniquement accessible en ligne, en téléchargement gratuit: < http://arxiv.org/ftp/arxiv/papers/0903/0903.5045.pdf >.]

Introduction. - The papyrus substrate. - Enhancing the letters [uses P. Schøyen I, 7 (= M.-P.3 490.11; LDAB 10024) and Inv. MS 2634/3 (= M.-P.3 537.1; LDAB 1311; Marganne 81)]. - The 7Q5 fragment (= van Haelst 1094; LDAB 6820). - The quality of the substrate. - Conclusions.
